name: ReWizard
description:
This project is our entry to Brackeys GameJam #4!

We initially had much larger plans for the game but had to cut them short due to time constraints. The game lets you play the role of a young mage apprentice called Nina who miscalculated heavily on how to properly rewind time and instead rewinded...space itself. So she's able to freely rotate the screen to her command.

Both me (Fermin Fernandez Diaz aka Narthelus) the artist and Ivan Albertti (programmer & game designer) are part of a (fantasy name only lol) group called "Lionfox". Hope you enjoy it as much as we did creating it!

Controls:

Q - E : Rotate screen left or right respectively to solve puzzles.

Press S or Down Key to Crouch through small spaces.

WASD or  Arrow Keys to move around and Jump like standard platformers.
